_sText:
gg_gladiator remade from scratch in hammer. Sadly it is not directly to scale due to my poor hammer skills! Reason for me remaking the map was due to the missing textures on top as they were distracting me during games and some walls didn't meet up correctly. Props to Draven who made the original.
Here is his profile: http://www.gamebanana.com/members/162298
